import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Container, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product_clicked = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <>

{product_clicked.name}

 Price: ${product_clicked.price} Description: {product_clicked.description} Price: ${product_clicked.price} Status: {product_clicked.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
